enterprise_trial.banner_body: Please contact us to convert from a trial to a paid subscription plan, or if you would like to switch from Enterprise to Classic TestRail.

overview.banner_body: You can contact us to convert your enterprise trial to a paid subscription plan. If you prefer an installation on your own server, or if you prefer to switch back to Classic TestRail instead, please contact us.

enterprise_standard.banner_body: Please contact us to manage your subscription.

overview.banner_body: The administration area lets you configure projects, various customization and integration settings as well as manage users, roles and permissions.

contact_us_create_subscription.link_text: Contact us to create a subscription

get_quote.link_text: Get a quote or contact support

subscription_box_body: Manage your subscription or create backups.
